name: minecraft-talk
description: A minecraft plugin allowing players to communicate over a website while playing.
author: Johannes Garz <jojogarz123@gmail.com> (https://www.garz.tech/)

scripts.install-all: npm i && cd webapp && npm i && cd ../backend && npm i
scripts.dev: npx concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd webapp && npm start"
scripts.build: cd webapp && npm run build && cd ../backend && npm run build
